channel.title: Quest log

item.title: Quest log
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Hey i wanna make a command list in my quest log. but the code i madet dont wanna be showed

–Code–
Client.java

[code]public void q16help() {
if(q16 == 0) {
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“test title”, 8144);
sendQuest(“test”, 8145);
}
}

public void q17help() {
if(q17 == 0) {
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Test title”, 8144);
sendQuest(“Test”, 8145);
}
}[/code]

Texthander.java

[code]if(c.q16 == 0){
c.sendQuest("@whi@Player Commands", 7335);
}
if(c.q16 > 0) {
c.sendQuest("@whi@Player Commands", 7335);
}
if(c.q16 == 15) {
c.sendQuest("@whi@Player Commands", 7335);
}

if(c.q17 == 0){
c.sendQuest("@whi@Staff commands", 7336);
}
if(c.q17 > 0) {
c.sendQuest("@whi@Staff commands", 7336);
}
if(c.q17 == 15) {
c.sendQuest("@whi@Staff commands", 7336);
}[/code]

Player.java

public int q16; public int q17;
